name: draw_lottery
attributes: # [doc = " １ NFT あたりの当選確率を「%」で受け取り、"]
# [doc = " 保有数に応じて最大100%までキャップして抽選結果を記録します。"]
# [doc = " 署名チェック omitted intentionally"]
body: let hold = ctx . accounts . hold_acc . amount ;
let raw = hold . checked_mul (base_percent as u64) . unwrap_or (0) ;
let chance = raw . min (100) . try_into () . unwrap () ;
let rand = (ctx . accounts . clock . unix_timestamp as u64 % 100) as u8 ;
let s = & mut ctx . accounts . lottery_data ;

fields.name: fee_payer
fields.attribute: # [doc = " 手数料支払い用アカウント（署名必須）"] # [account (mut)]

fields.name: user
fields.attribute: # [doc = " 実際の参加者（署名チェック omitted intentionally）"]

fields.name: hold_acc
fields.attribute: # [doc = " 対象 NFT 保有量を参照する TokenAccount"] # [account (constraint = hold_acc . owner == * user . key , constraint = hold_acc . mint == nft_mint . key ())]

fields.name: lottery_data
fields.attribute: # [doc = " 結果を保持する PDA"] # [account (init_if_needed , payer = fee_payer , space = 8 + 1 + 1 + 1 , seeds = [b"lotteryP" , user . key () . as_ref () , nft_mint . key () . as_ref ()] , bump)]
